content:
@Dave Register @Pavel Kalian
Master code now. Latest commit: ed25be551f9 (I'm not saying this commit is the source)
On Win:
When switching OpenGl off at runtime: See pict 1
If starting O when OpenGL=0 in config:
See pict 2
